column3: mma nnyɛ komm: Mma nnka w'ano nnto mu

column4: w'atamfo yɛ weɔɔ weɔɔ: Na hɔn a wokyir wo ama hɔn tsir do."

column2: "Wɔfa nyansanyansa pam wɔ wo man tsir do
column3: Na wɔbɔ mu tu egyina wɔ hɔn a ehuntsa hɔn no tsir do."
Hom mbra ma yenkruw hɔn ase ma wongyaa dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ɔman; Ama wɔnnkɛkaa Israel dzin bio."

column2: "Na wɔayɛ adwen kor abɔ mu etu egyina; Wɔkɔ wo tsir do apam:"
"Edom n'asesee nye Ismaelfo; Moab na Hagarfo;"
"Filistia ɔnye hɔn a wɔtse Taere: Asiria so dze noho abɔ hɔn ho; Wɔaboa Lot mba."
"Wɔherae wɔ En-dor; Wɔyɛɛ efikyir maa asaase."
"Yɛ hɔn etsitsir dɛ Oreb na Zeeb; Nyew
column3: hɔn mbapɔmba nyinara dɛ Zeba na Zalmunna:"
Hom mma yɛmfa Nyankopɔn ne tsenabea nyɛ hɛndze no."
yɛ hɔn dɛ huntuma a oridzi kyinhyia; Dɛ mframa enyim ntsɛw."
Na dɛ gyaframee a ɔto mbepɔw mu gya no;"
Na fa wo mframa dzendzen yi hɔn hu."

column2: "Fa enyimguase hyɛ hɔn atar; Ma wɔnhwehwɛ wo dzin ekyir kwan
"Ma hɔn enyi nto na hɔn bo ntu daa; Nyew
column3: ma hɔn enyim ngu ase na wɔnhera:"

column2: "Ma woeehu dɛ ɔwo a wo dzin dze EWURADZE no
column3: Ɔwoara nko nye Ɔsorsornyi wɔ asaase nyinara do."
